00035 RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::MeshViewerStats(QWidget* parent)
00036   :QWidget(parent){
00037 
00038   QVBoxLayout* vl=new QVBoxLayout(this);
00039   this->setLayout(vl);
00040 
00041 
00042   // FPS and Tri
00043   QHBoxLayout* layout=new QHBoxLayout(this);
00044   vl->addLayout(layout);
00045 
00046   QLabel* l1=new QLabel(tr("FPS :"), this);
00047   layout->addWidget(l1);
00048 
00049   labFps=new QLabel("0", this);
00050   layout->addWidget(labFps);
00051 
00052   QLabel* l2=new QLabel(tr("Tri :"), this);
00053   layout->addWidget(l2);
00054 
00055   labTri=new QLabel("0", this);
00056   layout->addWidget(labTri);
00057 
00058   // Pos and rot
00059   QHBoxLayout* layout2=new QHBoxLayout(this);
00060   vl->addLayout(layout2);
00061 
00062   QLabel* l3=new QLabel(tr("Pos :"), this);
00063   layout2->addWidget(l3);
00064 
00065   labPos=new QLabel("0", this);
00066   layout2->addWidget(labPos);
00067 
00068   QLabel* l4=new QLabel(tr("Rot :"), this);
00069   layout2->addWidget(l4);
00070 
00071   labRot=new QLabel("0", this);
00072   layout2->addWidget(labRot);
00073 
00074 
00075   setMaximumHeight(60);
00076 
00077   mSceneManager=Ogre::Root::getSingleton().getSceneManager("MeshViewerView");
00078   mCamera=mSceneManager->getCamera("MeshViewerCam");
00079 
00080 }

00085 RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::~MeshViewerStats(){
00086   delete labPos;
00087   delete labRot;
00088   delete labFps;
00089   delete labTri;
00090 
00091   labPos=NULL;
00092   labRot=NULL;
00093   labFps=NULL;
00094   labTri=NULL;
00095 }
00096 
00105 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::setFps(int fps){
00106   labFps->setNum( fps );
00107   updateCamStats();
00108 }
00109 
00118 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::setTri(int tri){
00119   labTri->setNum(tri);
00120 }
00121 
00128 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::updateCamStats(){
00129   Ogre::Vector3 posVec= mCamera->getPosition();
00130   Ogre::Vector3 dirVec= mCamera->getDirection();
00131 
00132   QString pos=vectorToString(posVec);
00133   QString dir=vectorToString(dirVec);
00134 
00135   labPos->setText(pos.toAscii());
00136   labRot->setText(dir.toAscii());
00137 }
00138 
00149 QString RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::
00150 vectorToString(const Ogre::Vector3& v){
00151   QString x,y,z;
00152   x.setNum(v.x, 'f', 2);
00153   y.setNum(v.y, 'f', 2);
00154   z.setNum(v.z, 'f', 2);
00155 
00156   QString vts="";
00157   vts+=x;
00158   vts+=",";
00159   vts+=y;
00160   vts+=",";
00161   vts+=z;
00162   return vts;
00163 }
